description:
A new Deathdrive appears from the nearby Tower and Bravern must beat it if the Allied Task Force is to have any hope of liberating Japan.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Dou Suru Isami! Konna Toki, Isami Nara Dou Surunda!
Well, Isami? What Would You Do in a Situation Like This?
どうするイサミ! こんな時, イサミならどうするんだ!
